title: Style Showcase: Lindsay Adler & Brooke Shaden
summary: In this episode of Learn+, Lindsay Adler collaborates with fine art photographer Brooke Shaden to create images inspired by three distinct pieces of art. The video highlights how two artists with different styles—one dark and mysterious, the other bold and graphic—approach the creative process to achieve unique results.

steps.action: Introduction by Lindsay Adler welcoming guest Brooke Shaden.
Explanation of the challenge: shooting concepts inspired by three different paintings.
Behind-the-scenes footage of the first concept shoot featuring a male model and dramatic lighting.
Behind-the-scenes footage of the second concept featuring bold, graphic polka dot styling.
Setup and shooting of a mysterious forest scene using specific lighting techniques.
Demonstration of a unique prop setup with a model posing inside a large clear bubble.

key_takeaways: Art history and paintings can serve as powerful inspiration for modern photography concepts.
Different photographers can interpret the same inspiration through vastly different creative processes.
Diverse styling, from graphic patterns to surreal props like bubbles, defines the mood of the final image.
